rows.label: qst202601_msg0001
rows.name: My wayward son, you have returned.

rows.label: qst202601_msg0002
rows.name:
Just happened to be here. It's not
like I came to see your face.

rows.label: qst202601_msg0003
rows.name: You haven't changed...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202601_msg0004
rows.name:
Well, no matter. I have
a favor to ask of you.

rows.label: qst202601_msg0005
rows.name: [ML:Dash ]A favor?

rows.label: qst202601_msg0006
rows.name:
Recently, an unfamiliar
monster has appeared within
this Genbu Divine Beast.

rows.label: qst202601_msg0008
rows.name:
It's been roaming around the Amphoret
Pillar for now, but there's no telling
when it may decide to attack Teos Aure.

rows.label: qst202601_msg0009
rows.name: Can't you just send the Luxurian army?

rows.label: qst202601_msg0010
rows.name:
I could, but entrusting it to you, who have the
Holy Grail, Ten'i, and other powerful Blades as
allies, would result in fewer casualties.

rows.label: qst202601_msg0011
rows.name: [ML:Dash ]King, is that an order?

rows.label: qst202601_msg0012
rows.name:
No, this is not an order.
I am asking for your
cooperation to save my people.

rows.label: qst202601_msg0013
rows.name:
Ten'i...[ML:Dash ] Would you lend
me your strength?

rows.label: qst202601_msg0014
rows.name:
[ML:Dash ]King, as you know, I once
went berserk and tried to
destroy this capital.

rows.label: qst202601_msg0015
rows.name:
If I fight near here again,
there's a possibility I
might repeat the same...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202601_msg0017
rows.name:
Say no more. As I've said before,
the you of today is a different
being from the you of the past...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202601_msg0018
rows.name: Above all, Rex trusts you, does he not?

rows.label: qst202601_msg0029
rows.name:
Above all, Nia trusts
you, does she not?

rows.label: qst202601_msg0030
rows.name:
Above all, Zeke trusts
you, does he not?

rows.label: qst202601_msg0031
rows.name:
Above all, Meleph trusts
you, does she not?

rows.label: qst202601_msg0019
rows.name: That is...[ML:Dash ] true, but...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202601_msg0020
rows.name:
Then there is no need
to be so pessimistic.

rows.label: qst202601_msg0023
rows.name:
Ten'i...[ML:Dash ] if you feel guilt,
how about thinking of this
as your atonement?

rows.label: qst202601_msg0024
rows.name:
Would not saving the many
people who live in this
capital be your redemption?

rows.label: qst202601_msg0025
rows.name: [ML:Dash ][ML:Dash ]King Serich...

rows.label: qst202601_msg0026
rows.name: Ten'i, I ask you again.

rows.label: qst202601_msg0027
rows.name:
Together with Rex, I want you
to save this country and its
people with your power.

rows.label: qst202601_msg0028
rows.name:
Together with Nia, I want you
to save this country and its
people with your power.

rows.label: qst202601_msg0033
rows.name:
Together with Zeke, I want
you to save this country and
its people with your power.

rows.label: qst202601_msg0034
rows.name:
Together with Meleph, I want
you to save this country and
its people with your power.

rows.label: qst202601_msg0032
rows.name:
Understood. I will do
everything in my power...[ML:Dash ]
